subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Felipe Massa outpaced Lewis Hamilton to take the pole position for today’s French Grand Prix. Massa was timed in 1 minute 15.034 seconds on the 2.74-mile circuit for his fourth Formula One pole of the season and the seventh of his career. Hamilton, the series points leader, who has seven consecutive top-three finishes, was second in 1:15.104, ahead of Kimi Raikkonen in 1:15.257.
